sn35.245:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.245:1.2: “kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti?
sn35.245:1.3: “Yato kho, avuso, bhikkhu channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti.
sn35.245:2.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.245:2.2: “kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti?
sn35.245:2.3: “Yato kho, avuso, bhikkhu pancannam upadanakkhandhanam samudayanca atthangamanca yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti.
sn35.245:3.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.245:3.2: “kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti?
sn35.245:3.3: “Yato kho, avuso, bhikkhu catunnam mahabhutanam samudayanca atthangamanca yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti.
sn35.245:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.245:4.2: “kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti?
sn35.245:4.3: “Yato kho, avuso, bhikkhu yam kinci samudayadhammam, sabbam tam nirodhadhammanti yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti.
sn35.245:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena, yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca: “idhaham, bhante, yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankamim; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavocam:
sn35.245:5.2: ‘kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti’ti?
sn35.245:5.3: Evam vutte, bhante, so bhikkhu mam etadavoca:
sn35.245:5.4: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhu channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti’ti.
sn35.245:5.5: Atha khvaham, bhante, asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro bhikkhu tenupasankamim; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavocam:
sn35.245:5.6: ‘kittavata nu kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti’ti?
sn35.245:5.7: Evam vutte, bhante, so bhikkhu mam etadavoca:
sn35.245:5.9: catunnam mahabhutanam samudayanca atthangamanca yathabhutam pajanati …pe…
sn35.245:5.10: yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhammanti yathabhutam pajanati, ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti’ti.
sn35.245:5.11: Atha khvaham, bhante, asantuttho tassa bhikkhussa panhaveyyakaranena yena bhagava tenupasankamim (…).
sn35.245:5.12: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhuno dassanam suvisuddham hoti”ti?
sn35.245:6.2: So yenannataro puriso kimsukassa dassavi tenupasankameyya. Upasankamitva tam purisam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:6.6: Tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena tadisovassa kimsuko yathapi tassa purisassa dassanam.
sn35.245:7.1: Atha kho so, bhikkhu, puriso asantuttho tassa purisassa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro puriso kimsukassa dassavi tenupasankameyya; upasankamitva tam purisam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:7.5: Tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena tadisovassa kimsuko yathapi tassa purisassa dassanam.
sn35.245:7.6: Atha kho so bhikkhu puriso asantuttho tassa purisassa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro puriso kimsukassa dassavi tenupasankameyya; upasankamitva tam purisam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:7.9: ‘ocirakajato kho, ambho purisa, kimsuko adinnasipatiko—seyyathapi siriso’ti.
sn35.245:7.10: Tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena tadisovassa kimsuko, yathapi tassa purisassa dassanam.
sn35.245:7.11: Atha kho so bhikkhu puriso asantuttho tassa purisassa panhaveyyakaranena, yenannataro puriso kimsukassa dassavi tenupasankameyya; upasankamitva tam purisam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:7.14: ‘bahalapattapalaso sandacchayo kho, ambho purisa, kimsuko—seyyathapi nigrodho’ti.
sn35.245:7.15: Tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena tadisovassa kimsuko, yathapi tassa purisassa dassanam.
sn35.245:7.16: Evameva kho, bhikkhu, yatha yatha adhimuttanam tesam sappurisanam dassanam suvisuddham hoti tatha tatha kho tehi sappurisehi byakatam.
sn35.245:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, ranno paccantimam nagaram dalhuddhapam dalhapakaratoranam chadvaram.
sn35.245:8.2: Tatrassa dovariko pandito byatto medhavi, annatanam nivareta, natanam paveseta.
sn35.245:8.3: Puratthimaya disaya agantva sigham dutayugam tam dovarikam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:8.7: Atha kho tam sigham dutayugam nagarassamikassa yathabhutam vacanam niyyatetva yathagatamaggam patipajjeyya.
sn35.245:8.10: dakkhinaya disaya agantva sigham dutayugam tam dovarikam evam vadeyya:
sn35.245:8.14: Atha kho tam sigham dutayugam nagarassamikassa yathabhutam vacanam niyyatetva yathagatamaggam patipajjeyya.
sn35.245:9.1: Upama kho myayam, bhikkhu, kata atthassa vinnapanaya.
sn35.245:9.3: ‘nagaran’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetam catumahabhutikassa kayassa adhivacanam matapettikasambhavassa odanakummasupacayassa aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammassa.
sn35.245:9.4: ‘Cha dvara’ti kho, bhikkhu, channetam ajjhattikanam ayatananam adhivacanam.
sn35.245:9.8: ‘Majjhe singhatako’ti kho, bhikkhu, catunnetam mahabhutanam adhivacanam—
sn35.245:9.11: ‘Yathagatamaggo’ti kho, bhikkhu, ariyassetam atthangikassa maggassa adhivacanam, seyyathidam—
